metadata.description: Vincent Price, one of classic Hollywood's most famous scary men, made a name for himself in classic mysteries and thrillers throughout the 1940's, 50's and 60's. Now Vincent Price Presents comes to Bluewater Productions as their first on-going, monthly series, featuring adaptations of some of Price's films as well as developing frightening new stories with his estate. Welcome back to the macabre world of Vincent Price!
metadata.name: Vincent Price Presents
